My name is Andrew R. Jones and I am a Marine Corps Combat Veteran of Operation Iraqi Freedom.  I served with Fox Co. 2/23 attached to 1st Marine Division, RCT-1 and performed combat missions in An Nasiriyah, Al Gharraf, Al Fajr and Baghdad during the initial invasion in 2003.  My post-war experience has ran me through an emotional hurricane with Post Traumatic Stress and a Traumatic Brain Injury suffered during the Battle of Baghdad on April 8, 2003.  As with many other Combat Veterans, I've turned to alcohol and drugs, attempted suicide, spent time behind bars for assault, been married and divorced twice and had my children taken from me. 
 
During the last two years I have finally began to get my life back on track.  I discovered how vitally therapeutic writing was for me.  I began seeing a Combat PTSD Counselor and through his guidance and my writing, I have turned my life around.  I still continue my healing process everyday and it has now become my mission to reach out to other Veterans and their supporting loved ones to motivate them to heal as well.  I now have a healthy relationship with my family, joint custody of my children and am engaged to an Angel. 
 
By contributing to this campaign, you will assist me in publishing and marketing an Anthology of poems and short stories focused on the issues Veterans and their loved ones endure.  By reaching out with my writing through Facebook and being published in 6 different literary journals including the International War Veterans Poetry Archives, I have already made an enormous difference in the lives of thousands of people and it is my mission to help others like me, heal their Warrior Hearts and get their stories out for everyone to read.  Along with my own writings, dozens of other Combat Veterans and loved ones have contributed their work to this Anthology and are dedicated to helping others heal. 
 
Your contribution to this book and to this movement is vital in allowing it to gain momentum and become a reality.   


What We Need & What You Get
To effectively publish and market this book so it gains enough exposure to quickly take off and reach thousands to hundreds of thousands and potentially millions of people, I am looking for an amount of $2,000. 
Every penny of this money will go directly to making this book become a reality and getting it in the hands of those who would benefit.  In addition to gaining exposure for the book, funds made from sales of the book will go towards helping Veterans organizations and continuing the movement of healing Warrior Heart's.
The perks for your contributions are explained in detail with the different levels of donations.  These perks range from my sincere gratitude, to personal "Thank You" messages, signed copies of the book, framed photos of my pictures on poems like the one featured above, canvas prints of the pictures on poems, a "Thank You" message featured in the book itself and if you donate the entire $2,000, I will consider it a loan that will be paid back in 12 months and you will be made aware of all decisions for the publishing and marketing of the book. 
If the entire amount of $2,000 is not achieved, the funds collected will still go directly towards the publishing and marketing of the book.  I am resourceful and will find ways to make this happen.  However, your help and contribution is important to achieving this mission in the quickest way possible. 
 


The Impact
Every single day in America, 22 Veterans are successful in killing themselves.  Much more make the attempt and countless more seriously contemplate the idea.  Our Veterans are homeless, behind bars, hiding behind drugs and alcohol and are in need of help!  Unfortunately, the pride of a Veteran makes it difficult to reach out.  It is my mission to reach out to these Veterans, motivate them to speak up and tell their stories and to be heard!  This book is only the beginning.  From this book, will spawn a movement to help Veterans and their families.  The people are there who want to help, the families and the Veterans themselves are calling for help in their own unique ways.  the impact of this book and more projects like it in the future, will cause a cultural change in America and our allied nations. 
 


Other Ways You Can Help
If you are unable to contribute monetarily, please get the word out about this campaign.  Share it with everyone you know and even those you don't know. I am a Marine and I will not stop fighting until my mission is accomplished. Much love and God bless you all.
 
Follow the links below to see some of my writing that has been published and is available online.  Also visit my Facebook Community Page to see the impact that is already occuring.  www.facebook.com/AndrewJones0351

 
http://www.mbc.edu/outrageousfortune-new/current-issue/volume-4-1/essays/al-gharraf-4/http://canyonvoices.asu.edu/i6/cold-waterhttp://iwvpa.net/jonesar/dark----.phphttp://iwvpa.net/jonesar/i-envy-y.php
 
http://www.loveyourveterans.org/triumphblog/

story:
Four New Zines

For over 20 years, I have been creating and publishing zines, but for the past year I have been living in a small town in rural Arkansas, where there is no decent copy shop within 80 miles. Never-the-less, on October 12, I am planning to come out of the mountains and return to Zine Fest Houston, an event I founded, where I will debut four new zines of mostly new material. The tentative titles are:

  • Ouachita Journal # 1: articles about Arkansas and essays about my experiences living, here, in Mena (located in the foothills of the Ouachita Mountains). This will not be a sentimental city slicker turns country boy story that romanticizes small town life. I will discuss the good, the bad, the ugly and the beautiful scenery. Illustrated with photos.
  • Offline Adventure Zine # 1: Offline adventure is about getting out and doing stuff in the real world, regardless of how old you are or how much money you have or any other excuse that may be holding you back. In the first issue, I will talk about a couple trips I took in my twenties -- hitchhiking to Austin in 93 and traveling to New York for the twentieth anniversary of Stonewall in 94, without enough money for a return ticket. I will also include an essay that reflects on the unexpected paths my life has taken.
  • shane # 9: shane is my ongoing minicomic, now in its tenth year, with a different theme each issue. This issue will feature articles, essays and reviews around the theme of comics, superheroes and gender studies. In one essay, I will talk about the online Gender Through Comic Books class I took this past spring, and I will also include a one-page comic I created as an assignment for that class.
  • Cluttered Mind # 3: This zine is a hodgepodge of my various writing and art projects and usually includes a mix of reprints and new material. This issue will feature essays, short fiction, comics, poems, reviews, illustrations and photos that don't fit the themes of the other zines in this project including a new Flyin' Man story, a poem about the apocalypse and an essay about when I brought Allen Ginsberg to the University of Houston.

These four zines will be more personal than most of my recent work and will represent a new direction in my artistic development. Each zine will be between 24 and 40 pages and if I make my goal, I am planning to include some full color pages.

A Mena Zinsta

Being a zinester out in the middle of nowhere provides many challenges. The most obvious problem is the lack of a zine community (or even an audience), but there are also physical obstacles, such as the fact that there is no decent copy shop within 80 miles.

For me this is particularly important, because not only did I used to rely on my favorite copy shop in Houston for printing, but without owning a printer or scanner, it was also a place to do the necessary prep work such as printing out text pages, reducing & enlarging art, and printing up the master copy.

If this project is fully funded, I intend to solve these problems by purchasing the complete set up to produce my zine entirely at home. This will include a printer/ scanner/ copier combo, a booklet stapler, a cutting board, ink, paper and more. As an added bonus, the printer I have chosen does full color, and I intend to take advantage of this in my zine design. By helping me obtain this equipment, you will not only be helping fund these four zines, but you will also help make my future projects possible.

The budget is as follows

  • $150 Printer
  • $75 Ink
  • $60 Paper - including cover stock
  • $40 Saddle Stapler
  • $35 Paper Trimmer
  • $25 Miscellaneous Expense - staples, glue, etc. 
  • $80 Estimated Postage - for mailing rewards
  • $50 Indiegogo Fees
  • $35 Pay-Pal Fees
  • $200 Travel to Houston for Zine Fest

In the event I do not make my entire funding goal, I will use the money I do raise to either go out of town to print my zine or stay a few extra days in Houston during the week before Zine Fest to work on printing, but every effort will be made to get all four zines out in time for Zine Fest Houston, but even the worst case scenario would not result in more than a slight delay for completion of the zines and fulfillment of rewards.

On the other hand, if I raise more money than is necessary, I will put the extra funds toward travelling to other small press shows (such as STAPLE! in Austin), bringing some of my minicomics back into print with deluxe editions or printing future zines. I will also offer additional premiums if I reach certain milestones over my goal (see Stretch Goal Rewards below).

The Premiums

As an incentive for contributing at various levels, I am offering copies of the zines themselves, credits inside the zines or on the back cover, back issues of my previous zines and comics, copies of upcoming publications, art and photo prints and even my services as an unconventional tour guide. Early pickup of zines can be arranged during Zine Fest. 

Stretch Goal Rewards

In addition to the regular premiums I have listed, helping me reach the following milestones will also result in additional rewards:

  • If I make $250 over my goal, I will produce a series of postcards based on my photos and art, and everyone who contributed at the $30 level or higher will receive a set of one dozen cards to be mailed by March 2014.
  • If I make $500 above my goal, I will compile a Best of "shane" 10th anniversary special which will include select reprints from back issues of "shane" plus excerpts from my sketchbooks and other side projects from the past 10 years. If this goal is met, A special signed and numbered edition, with a variant cover, will be mailed out by May 14 to everyone who contributed at the $50 level or higher (in addition to the postcards).
  • If I double my goal and make  a total of $1500 or more, I will combine photos of Houston with my art to create a very special full-color 10th Anniversary edition of my Walkin' Man comic to be mailed out by November 2014 to everyone who contributed at the $75 level or higher (in addition to the postcards and anthology).

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that's okay. I understand. But you can still help:

  • Let your friends know about this campaign and encourage them to contribute.
  • Use Indiegogo's sharing tools to post about this project on Twitter or Facebook.
  • Come to Zine Fest and stop by my table. Bring friends if you can.
  • Help out at my table during Zine Fest for an hour or two. In exchange, I will offer a $15 merchandise credit per hour. Email me: shane.patrick.boyle@gmail.com if you are interested in this offer.
  • Buy some of zines or art in the future when you have the resources.

Thank you in advance.

story:
Short Summary

I have been selected to attend the NEW LeadershipTM New York Summer Institute, an intensive seven-day leadership development program for women.  I will be joining 20 undergraduate women from across New York State to practice leadership skills and develop abilities necessary for effective political
engagement and community organizing.

As the Leadership Conference is entirely free, I am required to raise $500 for an aspiring woman leader to attend.

 

Here is a link to the campaign:

http://www.albany.edu/womeningov/programs/nlny.shtml

 

If you'd rather submit a check to donate for tax refund purposes, that's great as well! Checks should be made out to: "University at Albany/CWIG" with an additional note in the memo thta states "NYNLY: Lettas." Contact me for a mailing address.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The money, $500, will go directly to the NLNY to provide for a future "aspiring woman leader." 

If the goal isn't met, the funds will still go to to NLNY and to a future woman leader's attendance of the conference.

The ~perks~ are mostly little gems from me. You can opt out of them if you want (I think).

The Impact

The $500 will be just a stepping stone to increasing: 

  • Knowledge of the policy-making processes, and ways by which women can influence the
    process;
  • Self-efficacy of participants regarding leadership capacity and capabilities;
  • Leadership principles and approaches of women political and policy leaders;
  • how political campaigns are organized and run;
  • The critical importance of diversity in enriching the democratic political participation.

Other Ways You Can Help

It's totally cool if you can't contribute money, but that doesn't mean you can't help! 

Spread the word! Tell all your friends, tweet it, put it on Facebook, put it on Tumblr, e-mail it to your mom. 

Help young women 

 

Thanks so much!

story:
The Campaign is over. 

Thank you to everyone who helped out.
You can find more information on my writing at my website as well as on my Blog.

Cast in Blood

To the outside world, Morgan Blackstone is an eccentric business woman. But, inside her chest beats the undead heart of a 21st century vampire. Behind the doors of her nightclub, The Dracul, Morgan rules with an iron fist in a velvet glove.


After a long night of wrangling unruly supernaturals, she is looking forward to some peace… but unbeknownst to Morgan, her own blood is conspiring against her. Just before dawn, in the deserted parking lot, she comes face-to-face with two old adversaries, one of whom she had last seen being sealed in a tomb, 400 years before.


 Overpowered by her attackers, Morgan wakes inside the lab of an unscrupulous doctor. Held against her will, subjected to experiments, she soon realizes that something has begun to burn within her veins…

Something that she knows will kill her.

About the Author

  My name is Michelle Rabe. I’m collecting funds to publish my first novel as an eBook and as a print on demand paperback. I’ve been writing and telling stories all my life but began pursuing it professionally about three years ago. I’m a resident of Santa Cruz County in California. I have had three short stories published by the ‘Smoke and Mirrors’ podcast. My short story ‘Hard-Luck Harry’ is available on Amazon.com. You can find more information on my writing at my website as well as on my Blog.

story:
Hi,

I enjoy bringing books to life for kids to enjoy. So far I have over 30 children's books, all of which have gotten really good reviews and are liked by many. But they are costly to get the artwork done and to advertise, etc.

I have another 50 written that I would like to have done, so I figured it was worth a shot to give a campaign a try.

So I'm looking for a little help and providing you with a great opportunity to get your own work done as well.

Where the Money Goes?

Advertising - A big one, as without reviews and getting out there, you can have 1000 books and it won't matter.

Artwork - Probably the main expense, as a good artist, who are well worth it, can run up quite the tab.

Editing - while not as expensive as novels and such, it can still and does add up.

Why not draw them yourself?

As said above, "a good artist" , and I am anything but lol

Why not just do one or two?

If my goal isn't hit then that is what I will do. But I would rather be able to see all my work come to life than just try and pick one or two.

What do I get?

A good question and I believe everyone should get something. So the more you help the more you get.

Have a kids book idea or story you always wanted to get done? Well I will get that done for you.

Want to become a super villain? It can be done.

Want to be a character in a kids book? It can be done.

Want a little advertising? I can do that.

Just have a look at the great perks.

Conclusion

Thanks for you time and consideration, as I try and bring another 50 stories to life!

story:
What I'm Up To

On the morning of her thirteenth birthday, Lily kissed her father and knew that he would be dead by nightfall. The image of his death dropped into her mind suddenly and without warning. As her lips touched his she saw behind the thin skin of her closed eyes his face, pale and wet, rising up from the waves surrounded by caressing fingers of sea grass, and she screamed.

So begins LILY, a modern(ish) fairy tale about a girl who discovers she has the ability to see how others will die simply by touching them. Only she doesn't want this gift, and takes extreme measure to protect herself from it. When her mother--because every fairy tale has to have a wicked (step)mother--sells Lily's services to an evangelical preacher and his wildly popular travelling tent revival, Lily is torn away from the idyllic place she's always known as home and thrust into a world of greed and manipulation that threatens to destroy her unless she can find a way back. Oh, and did I mention that the old witch Baba Yaga has sent her on a quest as well? Or that there's an annoying 7-year-old boy preacher named Little James who tries to save her soul? Well, it's that kind of story. And that's all I'm going to say about it. 

Many of you already know me from novels including The Road Home, Z, What We Remember, Jane Bites Back, Suicide Notes, and many others. I've been writing and publishing for more than 20 years. In fact, it's the only job I've ever had. So why am I launching an Indiegogo campaign for my latest project? Because the publishing world has changed in dramatic ways over the past few years. The old model isn't working terribly well for most of us, and I believe it's time to explore other avenues for getting our work into the world.

LILY is an experiment in more ways than one. It's unlike anything else I've written. It's an odd book--a truly magical one--and it's been waiting patiently for its time to shine. It's also the first thing I've written without worrying about how it fits into the traditional publishing market. As a result, it's very special, and that's why I'm launching it in a special way.

I'm not telling you much more about the book because I want it to be a surprpise. (But you can read the first three chapters on my blog.) I'm hoping that if you've enjoyed my other work that you'll take a chance and see what I have in store for you this time. I can't guarantee that you'll love it, but what's life without a little adventure? 

What I Need & What You Get

I'm keeping this really simple. I'm raising money for the completition and production of the book. It's almost done. I just need to buy a few months to finish it. The physical reward for your contribution toward helping me do that is the book, in ebook, paperback, or hardcover format depending on the level you choose. With the ebook you get a hand-written thank-you card as well, because so far no one has figured out a way for authors to sign ebooks. The paperbacks and hardcovers will be inscribed.

"But this is a lot to pay for a book!" Yes, it probably seems like it is. But LILY isn't just any book. It's a book that will never be available in stores. I'm not doing this to get attention for the book in the hope that a big pubisher will want to snatch it up and give me more money for it. I'm doing it to show people--including myself--that there are still readers who value unique reading experiences. I'm only printing a few hundred copies, and once they're gone, they're gone. No one but Indiegogo supporters will ever have this first edition of this particular Michael Thomas Ford novel. 

So no, you won't get buttons or pencils or posters. You'll get a book. But it's a really special book. Only a few hundred other people will have it. And you'll also be helping us change how books get into the hands of readers.

And by the way, if someone tells you that $35 is too much to pay for a hardcover book, ask them how much they spent for the last concert they went to. I just shelled out $75 to see Blondie. Was it worth it? Absolutely. They were amazing. But a book is more than a 2-hour experience. Also, you get to keep it to read again. And if you want to, you can lend it to a friend to experience as well. These things all have value, even if a book doesn't (usually) come with Debbie Harry blowing you a kiss from the stage. (And if you really value that live, in-person experience, I have a donation level for that.)

The Impact

Let's take a moment for a lesson on how the traditional publishing industry works, because this might help explain why I'm undertakinng this experiment. As a writer, I give my book to a publisher. In exchange, they give me a little money (the advance) as a good faith gesture. But that money isn't really a payday. It's a loan. Before I get any more money from my book, I have to pay that loan back in the form of a royalty I'm credited with for each copy of my book that sells. Only after I've paid back the advance do I get any more money.

So let's say a publisher really loves my book and decides to give me an advance of 10K for it. (I'm using round numbers to make this easy on my math-impaired brain.) The publisher prints a paperback and assigns a price of $15. If I have a good deal with them, my royalty rate is 8% of that $15 sale price, so for every copy of LILY sold, I'm credited with $1.20. If my math is correct, this means I have to sell 8,334 copies of my book to pay back that 10K I was given as an advance. Only after that's done does the publisher owe me anything else.

And here's the thing--most writers never earn back that advance. 8,334 copies is a lot to sell. Most books sell far fewer copies than that. FAR fewer. So most authors are never going to see any money beyond what they were given for an advance. And advances are getting smaller and smaller as publishers get more and more reluctant to take chances on anything other than books with broad commercial appeal.

Part of the problem, of course, is that 92% of a book's sale price (on the paperback in my example) goes to the publisher. Now, they've taken all the risk and put up the money for editing, designing, printing, marketing, and distribution, so maybe this is fair. I'm not here to argue that. I'm just trying to explain why it is that the authors of the books you love to read so often seem to be in financial distress. 

This is why I love things like Indiegogo. It gives writers (and all artists) a chance to take our work directly to readers. A huge percentage of what you donate will still go to covering the costs of editing, designing, and printing a book, or recording a CD. But because more of what our work earns is going to us, the artists you support will have a fighting chance of going on to make the next record, or write the next book, or create the next show. By removing the obstacles created by outdated ways of operating, we're creating new opportunities. And that's exciting.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know there are a lot of ways you could spend your money. There are always other projects, or other deserving charities. One of my personal interests is dog rescue. There are literally millions of dogs out there who need help, and I can't help them all. So I make decisions based on where I think my time or money will be used most effectively. (That's not true. My decisions about dogs are generally irrational, which is why I have a house full of them.) My point is, I make choices every day about where to help, as I know you do as well. If you aren't in a position to donate to my campaign, please consider helping by spreading the word. All I need is 280 people to donate at the Paperback level, or 200 at the Hardcover level. Maybe there are even 467 people who want LILY as an ebook. Although I kind of hope not, as my arthritis makes it really difficult for me to write by hand, and the idea of writing and addressing 467 thank-you cards is kind of sick-making. But I'd do it for you. I'm a giver.

Please--share my campaign with friends you think might be into it. Put it on your Facebook page. Send out one of those awful "My friend is doing this cool thing!" emails. You'll get karma points. And if we meet in person, a hug. Possibly cookies.
story_txt:
What I'm Up To
On the morning of her thirteenth birthday, Lily kissed her father and knew that he would be dead by nightfall. The image of his death dropped into her mind suddenly and without warning. As her lips touched his she saw behind the thin skin of her closed eyes his face, pale and wet, rising up from the waves surrounded by caressing fingers of sea grass, and she screamed.
So begins LILY, a modern(ish) fairy tale about a girl who discovers she has the ability to see how others will die simply by touching them. Only she doesn't want this gift, and takes extreme measure to protect herself from it. When her mother--because every fairy tale has to have a wicked (step)mother--sells Lily's services to an evangelical preacher and his wildly popular travelling tent revival, Lily is torn away from the idyllic place she's always known as home and thrust into a world of greed and manipulation that threatens to destroy her unless she can find a way back. Oh, and did I mention that the old witch Baba Yaga has sent her on a quest as well? Or that there's an annoying 7-year-old boy preacher named Little James who tries to save her soul? Well, it's that kind of story. And that's all I'm going to say about it. 
Many of you already know me from novels including The Road Home, Z, What We Remember, Jane Bites Back, Suicide Notes, and many others. I've been writing and publishing for more than 20 years. In fact, it's the only job I've ever had. So why am I launching an Indiegogo campaign for my latest project? Because the publishing world has changed in dramatic ways over the past few years. The old model isn't working terribly well for most of us, and I believe it's time to explore other avenues for getting our work into the world.
LILY is an experiment in more ways than one. It's unlike anything else I've written. It's an odd book--a truly magical one--and it's been waiting patiently for its time to shine. It's also the first thing I've written without worrying about how it fits into the traditional publishing market. As a result, it's very special, and that's why I'm launching it in a special way.
I'm not telling you much more about the book because I want it to be a surprpise. (But you can read the first three chapters on my blog.) I'm hoping that if you've enjoyed my other work that you'll take a chance and see what I have in store for you this time. I can't guarantee that you'll love it, but what's life without a little adventure? 


What I Need & What You Get
I'm keeping this really simple. I'm raising money for the completition and production of the book. It's almost done. I just need to buy a few months to finish it. The physical reward for your contribution toward helping me do that is the book, in ebook, paperback, or hardcover format depending on the level you choose. With the ebook you get a hand-written thank-you card as well, because so far no one has figured out a way for authors to sign ebooks. The paperbacks and hardcovers will be inscribed.
"But this is a lot to pay for a book!" Yes, it probably seems like it is. But LILY isn't just any book. It's a book that will never be available in stores. I'm not doing this to get attention for the book in the hope that a big pubisher will want to snatch it up and give me more money for it. I'm doing it to show people--including myself--that there are still readers who value unique reading experiences. I'm only printing a few hundred copies, and once they're gone, they're gone. No one but Indiegogo supporters will ever have this first edition of this particular Michael Thomas Ford novel. 
So no, you won't get buttons or pencils or posters. You'll get a book. But it's a really special book. Only a few hundred other people will have it. And you'll also be helping us change how books get into the hands of readers.
And by the way, if someone tells you that $35 is too much to pay for a hardcover book, ask them how much they spent for the last concert they went to. I just shelled out $75 to see Blondie. Was it worth it? Absolutely. They were amazing. But a book is more than a 2-hour experience. Also, you get to keep it to read again. And if you want to, you can lend it to a friend to experience as well. These things all have value, even if a book doesn't (usually) come with Debbie Harry blowing you a kiss from the stage. (And if you really value that live, in-person experience, I have a donation level for that.)


The Impact
Let's take a moment for a lesson on how the traditional publishing industry works, because this might help explain why I'm undertakinng this experiment. As a writer, I give my book to a publisher. In exchange, they give me a little money (the advance) as a good faith gesture. But that money isn't really a payday. It's a loan. Before I get any more money from my book, I have to pay that loan back in the form of a royalty I'm credited with for each copy of my book that sells. Only after I've paid back the advance do I get any more money.
So let's say a publisher really loves my book and decides to give me an advance of 10K for it. (I'm using round numbers to make this easy on my math-impaired brain.) The publisher prints a paperback and assigns a price of $15. If I have a good deal with them, my royalty rate is 8% of that $15 sale price, so for every copy of LILY sold, I'm credited with $1.20. If my math is correct, this means I have to sell 8,334 copies of my book to pay back that 10K I was given as an advance. Only after that's done does the publisher owe me anything else.
And here's the thing--most writers never earn back that advance. 8,334 copies is a lot to sell. Most books sell far fewer copies than that. FAR fewer. So most authors are never going to see any money beyond what they were given for an advance. And advances are getting smaller and smaller as publishers get more and more reluctant to take chances on anything other than books with broad commercial appeal.
Part of the problem, of course, is that 92% of a book's sale price (on the paperback in my example) goes to the publisher. Now, they've taken all the risk and put up the money for editing, designing, printing, marketing, and distribution, so maybe this is fair. I'm not here to argue that. I'm just trying to explain why it is that the authors of the books you love to read so often seem to be in financial distress. 
This is why I love things like Indiegogo. It gives writers (and all artists) a chance to take our work directly to readers. A huge percentage of what you donate will still go to covering the costs of editing, designing, and printing a book, or recording a CD. But because more of what our work earns is going to us, the artists you support will have a fighting chance of going on to make the next record, or write the next book, or create the next show. By removing the obstacles created by outdated ways of operating, we're creating new opportunities. And that's exciting.


Other Ways You Can Help
I know there are a lot of ways you could spend your money. There are always other projects, or other deserving charities. One of my personal interests is dog rescue. There are literally millions of dogs out there who need help, and I can't help them all. So I make decisions based on where I think my time or money will be used most effectively. (That's not true. My decisions about dogs are generally irrational, which is why I have a house full of them.) My point is, I make choices every day about where to help, as I know you do as well. If you aren't in a position to donate to my campaign, please consider helping by spreading the word. All I need is 280 people to donate at the Paperback level, or 200 at the Hardcover level. Maybe there are even 467 people who want LILY as an ebook. Although I kind of hope not, as my arthritis makes it really difficult for me to write by hand, and the idea of writing and addressing 467 thank-you cards is kind of sick-making. But I'd do it for you. I'm a giver.
Please--share my campaign with friends you think might be into it. Put it on your Facebook page. Send out one of those awful "My friend is doing this cool thing!" emails. You'll get karma points. And if we meet in person, a hug. Possibly cookies.

story:
What Is This Book About?

You must have read or seen a lot of books about success… This book is different, though. This book is based exclusively on true facts and real-life stories of the most successful people of the 21st century. This book will finally reveal to you a key to success! In The Key of Success, the formula of success is built of stories, interviews, and tips from TODAY’S millionaires rather than people who got rich in the last centuries. In this book, you will read about the founders of Facebook, Google, Microsoft, and other millionaires whose stories, tips, and popular expressions will help you generate the GENERAL KEY TO SUCCESS. 

          

          

         


What do I want to tell my readers?

I have studied the biographies of many famous people of our time. Every person has their individual path, but all paths have some things in common, though. This is what I would like to talk about in my book The Key of Success. Having analyzed the interviews by the leading businessmen, I generated the general way to success which I would like to share with you.

After reading this book, you can immediately apply the practice described in it. You will be able to reach success and recognition, regardless of the position you are in at the moment. That set of steps will help you found your own successful business and reach the top position at your company.

This book will be useful for readers of any age. It’s never too late to drastically change your life! If I had read this book as a student, I would have avoided a lot of mistakes.  The Key of Success is the book that can change your outlook on life! 

                             

What I Need & What You Get

My goal is to find out whether people need my book. If you are interested in it, you are welcome to make a contribution. I want to create  a high-quality product that will help millions of people change their lives. The collected money will be spent on marketing and publishing. I hope that we will collect the amount of money we need!

            

What Do You Get?

10$ - a sincere thank-you letter from the author

25$ - a PDF-book sent to your e-mail address

35$ - a PDF-book + your name in the thank-you list

50$ - besides a PDF-book, you get an audio book

100$ -  you get a hardcopy with my autograph ( of course, you also get a PDF-book + audio book)

125$ -  you get a hardcopy with my autograph, delivered for free ( of course, you also get a PDF-book + audio book)

250$ - a page from the book will be dedicated to your own life story ( of course, you also get a PDF-book + audio book)

1000$ - you get 6 books (in different formats) and the opportunity to hold a video-conference by Skype with me

5000$  - you get 6 books (in different formats) and the opportunity to meet me and discuss the book. We can even write a chapter together.

story:
After 30 years my dream became a reality and I wrote what I believe to be the next best-selling novel. However, it has not been published and this is where you come in.

I need your help to raise the money to self-publish and promote my book titled, "When I Realized That I Would Never See You Again." I was divinely inspired to write this book which gives people a glimpse into life after death. A story that I tell in my deceased daughter's voice.

No amount is too small. Therefore, any contribution will be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance for your support!

Vikki

story:
Women Entrepreneur Revolution: Ready! Set! Launch!

There are over 8.6 million women-owned business in the U.S. alone - more than the population of New York City.  And the number is growing! 

I believe there is so much good that can come from empowering women to be financially independent through owning their own business. It gives them flexibility and the ability to follow their passions and purpose while also enabling them to contribute to their families, create jobs, give back to their communities and the world at large.

There is a massive boom of women entrepreneurs coming on the scene which is exciting and promising yet many women are going it alone and seriously lacking the support, tools and models of success that are available to them.

That's where I come in.  Hi, I’m Jenn Aubert.  I’m an acupuncturist by day and an entrepreneur, writer, wife and mom every other waking minute.  I live in Oakland, CA with my husband and 3 year old adorable yet rambunctious son. 

Back in the Fall of 2012 I asked a simple question to a group of women that changed my life forever and leads me here to you:

“Ladies, who are your role models in business?”


From the answers, or lack thereof, of hundreds of women entrepreneurs in an online forum, came the idea for the Role Models Wanted Project. 

The Project.
Within one year from my 39th birthday in March 2013 to my 40th birthday in March 2014, I set out to interview 100 female entrepreneurs from a variety of industries, geographies and points in their career looking to understand where all the role models for women starting a business were hiding.

What came out of the year of speaking to these amazing women is that there are common traits that they all share – certain mindset, motivations, definitions of success and ways of connecting that created success. I realized that women starting a business most likely already posses these traits, characteristics and drives but may need to recognize, foster and develop them a bit more.  They needed a compass, a flight plan, a map.

The Book.


Women Entrepreneur Revolution: Ready! Set! Launch!  is just that. It is a guide to help women discover what it takes to be successful as well as provides inspiration, wisdom and advice from over 100+ other women daring to go out there and design a life they adore.

As I see it,  we are better able to believe in ourselves when we see examples of other people  - other women - succeeding. 

Role models are essential and they are everywhere once we stop to look. 

Our bar is set so high when it comes to ‘role models’. The usual suspects, billionaires and celebrities, are our default but role models walk amongst us everyday, everywhere. I'm not talking about the need to find others to imitate. We can be inspired by others doing remarkable things in business and in life while holding true to our authenticity and our unique mark on the world.

Women entrepreneurs are the future. Let's prepare them for wild, wonderful, and amazing success.


What's Needed ...

The book is written and ready to go. Yahoo!

It's being self-published through Balboa Press, a division of Hay House. I'm looking for help with the launch and getting the book printed and in the hands of people ASAP.

I’m looking to raise $4,200 to help with production and publicity costs.

The money will go directly towards:

  • Production costs for first print run of the book (Balboa Press) - $2,400
  • Publicist to help get the word out (Blue Lobster Book Co)- $1,000
  • Virtual book tour services (Blue Lobster Book Co) - $800


If I exceed my goal, then the money will go towards a physical book tour starting in San Francisco (and adding on New York and San Diego after that).


... And What You Get

This is the fun part.  Here are some of the highlights.

  • Signed and inscribed copies of the softcover (retail value: $17.99) or hardcover versions (retail value: $35.95) of the book before it's officially launched.
  • A raw and candid "Behind the Scenes" Chapter (pdf sent to your email) that is not available for sale - anywhere.
  • Women's T-shirt that says "I am a role model".  One of a kind and limited run. Created specifically for the Role Models Wanted Project. It's a great gift to give to YOUR role model or for you to wear on those days you just need a pick me up.
  • A limited-edition piece designed and crafted by KMH makes. Gorgeous piece designed exclusively for this campaign! See the pictures below. You can see more of Karen's work at http://kmhmakes.com/.  SEE UNDER THE 'GALLERY' TAB ABOVE FOR PICTURES OF THIS BEAUTIFUL PIECE!

**Thanks Karen Hancock for modeling the shirt**


The Impact

"Who will be impacted?" you may ask.

There is a massive influx of women starting their own businesses and are looking for support, inspiration and those to learn from.  Starting your own venture can be a scary, but if there are tools to help you launch and grow as well as models of success available, it will make the journey so much easier and amazing.

:: Women who are looking to take the leap and start their own business.
:: Any women who wants to launch a hobby, pursue a passion or simply wants to be inspired by the kick-ass things other women are doing.
:: Female entrepreneurs and business women growing their business to the next level but are feeling stuck.
:: Girls and women who are looking for inspiration and strategies to help fuel their next professional and personal steps.
:: The families, husbands, children and communities of women who start a business, live their passions and share with others their success.


Other Ways You Can Help

Let’s make some noise!
Help spread the word about the book!  


If you’d like to help out in other ways, please please please email, tweet, Facebook, etc to your friends and family and anyone you think would benefit from this book!  (or who would just like to help a gal and her book out)

I will be so very grateful for the love and sharing!  Good Karma points for sure!

Indiegogo has made it super easy for you to help spread the word.

Just use the tools/buttons provided and click away! 

**Please note! If you're having technical troubles contributing, please message me directly. **

so much easier and amazing.:: Women who are looking to take the leap and start their own business.:: Any women who wants to launch a hobby, pursue a passion or simply wants to be inspired by the kick-ass things other women are doing.:: Female entrepreneurs and business women growing their business to the next level but are feeling stuck.:: Girls and women who are looking for inspiration and strategies to help fuel their next professional and personal steps.:: The families, husbands, children and communities of women who start a business, live their passions and share with others their success.

Let’s make some noise!Help spread the word about the book!  If you’d like to help out in other ways, please please please email, tweet, Facebook, etc to your friends and family and anyone you think would benefit from this book!  (or who would just like to help a gal and her book out) I will be so very grateful for the love and sharing!  Good Karma points for sure!Indiegogo has made it super easy for you to help spread the word.Just use the tools/buttons provided and click away! **Please note! story:
It didn’t take long for me to realize that Clara Lee was on to something.  So, read this book. Savor the images.  Reflect on the words.  And as you do those things, know that the simplest pieces of advice are often the most profound.  Don’t be surprised if something you might have thought of as frivolous turns out to hold the key to discovering your inner beauty.

- Robert J, Thomas, Best-Selling author, consultant of leadership and transformational change, and writer for Harvard Business School Review and MIT Sloan Management Review

 

Hello! my name is Clara Lee and I am full of love, imperfections, laughter, goofy moments, and passion.

     

Thank you sincerely for taking the time to open this campaign! I am so delighted and grateful to have this opportunity to share this with you and possibly gain your heart filled support for this project as I’ve been working on this project for the past year and a half with passion and dedication in ultimately inspiring and helping other people with this book!

 

 

Objective of this Campaign: 

As we officially launch The Cupcake Theory book on October 1st, 2013, we are raising money for website development, additional printing, education and promotion. This campaign will truly begin the movement to influence and empower our teens and young adults and women on reaching true happiness and wholeness in our relationships, love, and dating! The Cupcake Theory book exposes the single most important ingredient in being happy in our relationships through self-love. 

                                   

                                     

Cupcakes are already the sweetest treats in the whole world! Now, there’s a THEORY behind it that will change our lives and our relationships called The Cupcake Theory! Imagine cupcakes making you happy inside and out?! That’s seriously… SWEET!

I truly and sincerely believe that if we hold hands and synergize, we can make the impossible possible and positively change the world & I also know that I am where I am because of the support I received from others!

Please help introduce The Cupcake Theory to the world, let’s make this OUR project!

 

Once we reach our goal, the rest of the funds will go to: 60% non-profit organization(s) and 40% continuing this movement (please see 'where the funds will go' section for more information)  

 

                                                 

 Cupcakes are now so trendy, but Clara Lee’s advice is tested, tried and ever true.  Teen girls, in particular, should heed her simple lessons about loving and depending on themselves as the cornerstone for a healthy romantic relationship.
                  
- Janet Lever, Author/Professor/Former Columnist for Glamour magazine

 

 Truly inspiring.  I really enjoy the simplicity of the layout, the wonderful illustrations and your straight forward, uplifting prose.  A delicious theory that, for the rest of your life, will cause you to pause every time you bite into a cupcake. Discover the true meaning of cake versus frosting.

- Ron Buse, Creative Services director, top Fortune 500 entertainment company

                                         

The Impact & About The Book

No matter what kind of person we are, we all share one thing in common… desire to love and foster relationships. But if this is what truly creates happiness, why is it the most complex and the hardest thing to grasp?

Even when we are involved in a long term relationship or marriage, we often fall into moments of worry and doubt for our partners and ourselves. Is this normal? How can we resolve this? Why is it that when this journey of building relationships seems daunting, we are made to be communal beings?

We all deserve to be happy and successful in our relationships… and my team and I truly believe that The Cupcake Theory will make a contribution in reaching this goal of happiness in our world.

The Cupcake Theory Book is a short 64 page novelty book that can be gifted, put on coffee tables, or carried around in your pocket book. This is a simple yet profound little book of wisdom that sticks with you forever in a unique perspective about relationships. After you read this book, you will never look at cupcakes the same way!

The book consists of 10 illustrations and insightful text that is relatable and comparable. The book is very engaging and exciting to read quickly. Since the moment I came up with this theory, I never looked at my relationships the same way. I have also shared this concept with my friends and family and they too will state that they can’t help but to remember the CCT ever since I explained the theory to them. The Cupcake Theory is a little book for the people. It’s for all of us to savor and apply in our own lives… it’s a book that is so inevitable to remember.

This book will make a difference in our lives whether in our romantic or professional relationships and you can be part of it! I will make sure you are recognized and part of this movement as our contributor.

 

The Story

I have a dream… a passion, and that is to inspire and help other individuals in the world overcome various obstacles and reach their fullest potentials in their lives. I have realized this path for myself when I temporarily lost my eyesight at age 19; followed by a full year of post-surgery rehabilitation where I had to be forced to give up all of my passions in the arts from hip-hop dancing and choreographing to modeling, and even singing for the entire year. I was told that if I resumed doing any high intensive exercise or activity that required putting pressure in my eyes, I may have permanent sight loss. Being forced to give up on the biggest part of myself (performing and being the biggest clown/entertainment for the people) and the driver of my inspiration and energy, I could not help but cave inward and spend the next year after surgery being in the most vulnerable, confused, and emotional place of my life. For a whole year straight, I had to go in and out of emergency rooms and doctor visits once every week for check-ups, not even mentioning the medical bills I had incurred because back then I didn’t know the different between PPO and HMO insurance!

This circumstance gave me two choices, either go: 1. “balls out” (if I had one!) crazy, give up on my life, and be reckless or 2. take this time to look inward and identify what is really important to me, and find ways to cope with my situation, and get help from people and my loved ones.

Luckily, I chose the second option.

During this time, since I couldn’t express myself through performing arts, I began to write even more than I used to (I’ve always been a journal writer), read, think on my own, talk and listen to friends, family and mentors who reached out to help me…

During the countless, probably a whole water tower worth of, tears, encouraging words and hopeful laughter from my supporters, I realized how much of an impact this had on me where my darkest outlook and perspective was transformed into enlightenment and inspiration.

Don’t get me wrong - I also saw many people who I thought were my best friends, boyfriend, and supporters slowly march their way out of my life in various ways. In addition, I also saw those people, who I never expected to be there for me, voluntarily enter into my life with love and compassion. These events made me experience the ride of the most extreme ‘emotional roller coaster!’

Despite my circumstances, these relationships really fostered happiness, inspiration and strength inside of me to fight through my physical challenges.

Through this experience, I had learned the importance of relationships from friendships to romantic encounters, as well as, what it really takes to stay happy and successful in them… It had made such an impact in my life - I knew this was my calling.

Gratefully, I am seeing out of my two eyes now, and back pursuing my passions in entertainment, fashion and media with a slightly different motivation and direction than I had when I was 19 years old. Now my focus is applying my talents and love for business and helping others see what’s really important… their inner beauty and inner energy. For the past two years, I have started this movement through modeling, winning titles nationally, being published in magazines and newspapers, as well as, coaching aspiring models and artists to help them gain confidence and realize their beauty despite size or class; emphasizing that the strength and courage to be happy and successful all comes from within.

Now, I am ready to continue my journey and return my life-changing gift I received during my darkest times back to the world through my passions… starting from what drove my inspiration and courage when I couldn’t express myself through my passions: Writing & Relationships.

So here I am, with my first book, The Cupcake Theory, a self-help, inspirational novelty book that reveals the secret ingredient to being happy and successful in your relationships!

 

Why is it so important?

I am not trying to create The Cupcake Theory into just a book, but as the beginning of a movement; a movement for all of us to finally begin to see that the core ingredient to being happy and taking control of our relationships is looking within ourselves. The goal of this book is truly, to empower every single one of us in relationships through using a simple yet sweet analysis of cupcakes and our souls which will help us remember the concept. I hope to reach as many people and spread the message to the world in various languages and forms (book and other types of media) so we can all have a bit more clue to this thing we call: life.

Moreover, this project is so important to me… I have faithfully dedicated myself to contribute in unconditionally helping individuals, making the world a better place, and showing what really matters. On a personal note, this project is important to me because The Cupcake Theory will help me accomplish my goals of helping others and spreading inspiration to the world.

Before my eye experience and numerous relationships experiences, I thought I was invincible - no sense of filter, just so new to everything... Then when I woke up that one summer morning in New York City, seeing nothing but black dots out of my right eye, stumbling out of bed, digging into the bathroom mirror, rubbing my eye thinking it’s just fallen eye lashes and “sleepys” in my eye, I now know that it was an opening to my calling and mission in life. That year and a half of blindness and struggles were the preparation to the path of my life’s destiny. So please, join me in this movement and growth together… The Cupcake Theory will be put into good purpose!

 

Our Goal: $25,000

                    

 

What You Get

                         

By Contributing to this campaign, you will:

  • Inspire teens, young adults, women, and men who value relationships and want to better their relationships
  • Be inspired
  • Help people see what truly matters for our happiness
  • Be part of The Cupcake Theory movement where you will be part of the initial launch of spreading this message
  • Become a lifelong practitioner of happiness and healthy relationships
  • Join Clara's team and become the pioneers of this great cause and movement
  • Support Clara into spreading this message of The Cupcake Theory and revolutionizing the world with her perspectives

In addition to these worldly contributions you will be making if you support The Cupcake Theory, you will also receive:

 

  1. The Gratification Cupcake for you $15+

    1. Sincere Thank you and Virtual Hug
    2. Name recognition on The Cupcake Theory official website

  2. The Love Cupcake for you $25+

    1. Everything in The Gratification Cupcake
    2. Plus The eBook

  3. The Inspirational Cupcake for you $35+

    1. Sincere Thank you and Virtual Hug
    2. Name recognition on The Cupcake Theory official website
    3. Plus The Hardcopy Book w/ signature

  4. The Compassion Cupcake for you and another (2 Hard Copies!) $50+

    1. Everything in The Inspirational Cupcake
    2. Plus another Signed Hardcopy of The Book to share with someone you care about! Share the love! Join the Movement! Be the Change!

  5. The Happiness Cupcake $100+

    1. Everything in The Compassion Cupcake
    2. Plus a limited edition + signed Cupcake Theory poster (hang the Theory on your wall so you can always remember the secret to your happiness and success in relationships!

  6.  The Enlightenment Cupcake $250+

    1. Everything in The Happiness Cupcake
    2. Plus a featured picture of yourself on the recognition page with One question that you may ask that I will answer publicly on The Cupcake Theory Official website

  7. The Legacy Cupcake $500+

    1. Everything in The Enlightenment Cupcake
    2. Plus Three 45 minute relationship/life coaching session on Skype (Please share your Skype ID!)

  8. The Heavenly Cupcake $1000+

    1. Everything in The Legacy Cupcake
    2. Plus Customized/Personalized Video created by Clara Lee Dedicated to a person of your choice on one of the following topics: Self-Confidence, Relationship, Self-Love, Cupcake Theory!



Where The Funds Will Go:

In creating the Cupcake Theory, I have collaborated and partnered with the most creative, experienced, and talented professionals from all over the world. Book design, cover design, formatting, typesetting, illustrations, editing, photography, legal, copywriting, website design, all required extremely high personal costs. Though I decided to independently publish this book through my own publishing company, I have taken every single step that a traditional publishing company takes thanks to the help of my creative team, business mentors, lifelong friends and professional connections.

The Cupcake Theory Book has been accepted by an extremely reputable and global distribution company. Usually, large distributors rarely take on one titled publishers / authors unless the authors show huge potential and they truly believe in the book. Same goes for overseas reputable printing companies. The book has been also endorsed by reputable industry professionals from a Best Selling author, former Glamour Magazine writer, professor and author, dean of a very renowned university, life coaches who change and transform lives of individuals, as well as, entertainment company professionals and personalities.

With such great honor and support from others comes responsibility. And that responsibility is to truly work my absolute best to get The Cupcake Theory out to public where people can get it, read it and really benefit from it. This is where your help can come in. Help us print more books and create the website that can speak for its own! This includes printing overseas, working with a very reputable and global distribution company (who made an exception to taking on The Cupcake Theory due to its message), legal contracts, working with renowned editors, endorsers, designers, typesetters, reviewers, business costs, website creations.

The book IS completed and the initial print run is in the process and the book will launch October 1, 2013; however, to push this project to true fruition and its fullest potential, we need as much help as possible from you. As mentioned before; we are creating a movement, not just a single book. The book will continue its message through various forms of writing and media. We need your help to kick start this!

Most of the funds will go towards:

  • Continuing and spreading the Movement  
  • Printing more books: The book printing and shipping costs are very high, the initial printing amount for October 1, 2013 is not sufficient enough to reach the amount of targeted audience and the demand The Cupcake Theory has already created.  
  • Shipping Costs for the book: Transportation, Customs, and Freight costs can be over $1000+ on its own. (Shipping from overseas)
  • Website creation of The Cupcake Theory movement: Hiring reputable web designers and developers is extremely costly. Especially if we want to create a website that is user friendly with buy /functionalities and customization.

Once we reach our goal, the rest of the funds will go to: 

  60% of the additional raised funds will go to helping non-profit organizations helping teen girls from under-resourced communities to be confident, inspired, college-bound, and career-ready as well as inpiring women 

The Rest 40%will go towards continuing the movement: Translations into 5 different languages: Spanish, Korean, French, Russian, Chinese

  • Printing Hard Copies
  • Creating eBook
  • Global Marketing and Country specific marketing and promotions
  • Additional Printing Costs
  • Publishing the next 2 books pertaining to The Cupcake Theory (Already In Progress!)
  • Promotions, Marketing

 

Can't fund? No worries! There are plenty of other ways You Can Help!

  • Get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Tell your friends; Share the campaign link with your friends! Put it on your social media!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to share this with friends!
  • Join The Cupcake Theory facebook page: www.facebook.com/cupcaketheorybk
  • Join The Cupcake Theory Twitter page: www.twitter.com/cupcaketheorybk
  • Leave comments on your own social network pages and blogs!
  • Leave comments and reviews on our amazon and book website!
  • Brainstorm and partner on any business ideas and collaborations

 

                                          

At its core, Clara Lee’s ‘The Cupcake Theory’ is a meditation on accepting your real love and true strength as a person.

- Kenneth Elmore, Dean of Students at Boston University

                                         

 
Clara's other Contributions:

Some contributions from the past and continuing…:

  • Conduct leadership and motivational conferences and seminars and 1:1 sessions for corporate employees after work hours
  • Volunteer and mentor high school students
  • Offer relationship coaching for teens, young adults, adults in various industries
  • During my Boston university College years, I volunteered at a public charter school and helped new immigrant parents and children learn English, lifestyle, and culture. You can learn a lot from children! J
  • Started a community group called Inspired N’ Confident in Los Angeles where I host and help fellow individuals of all ages gain confidence and explore the true meaning of inspiration and life and motivation.
  • Inspirational speaker and motivational speaker for teens and young professionals in relationships and career
  • Model and Talent Coach: Train and Coach aspiring, young models for New York Fashion Week shows, Modeling Auditions, Modeling Competitions, on self-confidence, image and presentation.
  • Host and speak at the International Fashion Super Model Competition as former IFSM Super Model Miss Asia Boston, but moreover, as a friend and fellow artist to help aspiring, beginning model girls realize the importance of their inner beauty and confidence.
  • Fundraise and Donate to The Home For Little Wanderers Non-Profit Organization on my Birthdays

    Some fun Videos: 
  • America's Next Top Model CW28 Winner 

  • Radio ProFM ANTM Interview 2012

  • Balance Between Negativity and Positivity

  • Etc...

 

  

Photos from our Social Media Campaign: 

  • The Cupcake Theory Social Media Launch Video

 

 

 

I sincerely thank you with all my heart!

Clara Lee

Savor the images.  Reflect on the words.  And as you do those things, know that the simplest pieces of advice are often the most profound.  Don’t be surprised if something you might have thought of as frivolous turns out to hold the key to discovering your inner beauty.
- Robert J, Thomas, Best-Selling author, consultant of leadership and transformational change, and writer for Harvard Business School Review and MIT Sloan Management Review

Objective of this Campaign: 

As we officially launch The Cupcake Theory book on October 1st, 2013, we are raising money for website development, additional printing, education and promotion. The Cupcake Theory book exposes the single most important ingredient in being happy in our relationships through self-love.

Inspirational speaker and motivational speaker for teens and young professionals in relationships and career
Model and Talent Coach: Train and Coach aspiring, young models for New York Fashion Week shows, Modeling Auditions, Modeling Competitions, on self-confidence, image and presentation.
Host and speak at the International Fashion Super Model Competition as former IFSM Super Model Miss Asia Boston, but moreover, as a friend and fellow artist to help aspiring, beginning model girls realize the importance of their inner beauty and confidence.
Fundraise and Donate to The Home For Little Wanderers Non-Profit Organization on my BirthdaysSome fun Videos: 
America's Next Top Model CW28 Winner 


Radio ProFM ANTM Interview 2012


Balance Between Negativity and Positivity


Etc...

 

  
Photos from our Social Media Campaign: 



The Cupcake Theory Social Media Launch Video


 

 
 
I sincerely thank you with all my heart!
 
 
Happiness and Smiles... 
Clara Lee

story:
Hello friends,my name is Okaybabs. I want to write two books (one for the wives and the second one for the husbands) that will help make marriages happy and blissful and I need your support in funding the project. The funds raised will help to cover the costs of printing ($2000), editing ($500), graphic designing ($200) and eventual mailing of copies to the supporters for funding this project (Depends on the numbers of supporters). Money is also needed for the production of the T-Shirts, Posters, Poems, Tapestry Throws and the Pillows which also depend on the numbers of supporters. All these project products are designed to enhance marrital relationships and family lifes. The title of these books are:

1. Become Irresistible To Your Husband In 7 Days

2. Become Irresistible To Your Wife In 7 Days

 

– Bring back love, passion, intimacy and respect like the way it used to be during your courtship and honeymoon and shortly thereafter.

 – Divorce-Proof Your Marriage. - Discover The Secret of a Happy, Holy and Lasting Marriage.

 

All the Funders get IRRESISTIBLE PERKS:

(They are great gifts to yourself, friends, dads, moms, sons, daughters, in-laws, brothers, sisters, pastors, Muslims, Buddhists, Hindus, Atheists, etc.)

(& for all occasions including, wedding, anniversary, Christmas, birthday,  graduation, bridal shower, baby shower, thanksgiving, appreciation, mother's day, father's  day, thanks & encouragement.

The Book for a Wife:

"Become Irresistible To Your Husband In 7 Days" THE FINISHED FRONT COVER DESIGN..

The Book for a Husband:

"Become Irresistible To Your Wife 7 Days" (book). THE FINISHED FRONT COVER DESIGN.

Our Heart Desires

What we all desire is love, compassion, respect and a stable and peaceful home. We truly want to be together forever with our husband or wife. But we have been shocked to see the harsh reality of the unpleasant state of  the marriage institution in our society where divorce rate is about 50%. It is obvious that things are currently not the way God the Author of the marriage institution intended it to be. God “…saw every thing that he had made,including marriage, and, behold, it was very good.” You can see it yourself that not all marriages in our society today can be called very good, beautiful or honorable.

       My dear friend, you don’t have to be part of the bad statistics, and if you are already in such a situation there is help. There is a solution. In these books you will learn how to become irresistible to your very own dear husband or wife in just 7 days. Yes it is possible. It has worked for many already. Bring back love, passion, intimacy and respect like the way it used to be during courtship, honeymoon and shortly thereafter and divorce-proof your marriage. Discover the secret of a happy, holy and lasting marriage. All you need to do is to just follow the practical guidelines in these books.

Here are some of the headlines in these books:

* Prepare to be free and responsible; have your own private home as a family.

* Both of you MUST agree on how to relate to the in-laws. You must have a common front.

* You did not meet each other by chance and your marriage is not a mistake. All things can work together for good

* Let the courtship and honeymoon be continued in principle. You can bring back those good old days.

* Make love your daily goal to measure up. With true love, your marriage cannot fail. Compete in giving and to out-giving each other love and not in power struggle. Surprise each other with little gifts.

* Compliment your spouse often and focus on what is good about your spouse. Use endearing names (honey, sugar, babe, sweetheart, darling or handsome etc.)  when calling your spouse.

* Harsh, angry words crush your spouse's desire to please you. Therefore determine to speak softly and kindly. Do not criticize or nag. Remember that criticism and nagging destroy love.

* Try to make your partner happy, rather than good. Try and give seven compliments before one suggestion or criticism.

* Be each other best friends. Learn to laugh and enjoy wholesome times together by playing and doing things together in moderation and with balance. Be considerate and lookout for the well-being of the other person. Do not always insist on your own ways.

* Be clean, modest, orderly, hardworking and always be ready to lend a helping hand with enthusiasm.

* Talk things over and counsel together freely. Learn communication and conflict resolution skills so you can avoid many blunders that could destroy your marriage.

* Take time to discuss and agree on how to spend the money.

* Never go to bed angry with each other.

* Pray audibly together with each other and for each other. Bless your spouse and do not curse. What you prophesy to your spouse and your children usually come to pass. There is God given power in your words, use it to profit your family and not to destroy it.

* Agree that divorce is not the answer, because it is not a positive solution, and that God hate divorce. Forgiveness is always better than divorce.

* Do not be deceived by the thought that the grass is always greener on the other side of the fence.

* Men, remember that for you to have success in whatever you do in life, you MUST love, cherish, live with your wife according to knowledge, give honor to her and win her by gentle persuasion and not by force, threat, coercion, manipulation, withdrawal, neglect or apathy.

* You only have one life to live, so live it to the fullest with a purpose and you must both agree on that goal. Do not settle for less.

Excerpt from the books

       "Yet I had another opportunity to exhibit my art at an art show even much earlier than the one I told you before. Soon after I finished setting up my booth that morning, a lady who was an art lover come to my booth and started to look through my artworks that were on display. So like a tour guide I started to familiarize her with the artworks. As I was explaining to her about the “Together Forever”, I decided to read to her the poem that I wrote to accompany the “Together Forever”art piece. When I finished reading it to her she then asked me regretfully, “Where were you a month ago before I divorced my husband? I wish I knew this earlier” she said. Like this humble lady who is now an “ex-wife” of an “ex-husband”, many men and women wish they knew better before their marriages hit the rock. It is probably a common knowledge that it is not all divorce incidents that have a soft landing. Some at times do have a terrible crash against a hard rock and sometimes these marital accidents become fatal. The news media is filled with such horrible cases.

       One man after securing all the children in the house, called up his wife on the phone and shot all their children and then himself while the wife was listening. He decided to take that route after he had repeatedly pleaded with his wife not to divorce him and the woman insisted on proceeding with her decision anyway and then finalized the divorce. Another man just walked off his marriage leaving his wife and their young and growing children behind at the time when they needed him the most. He left them to languish and struggle to survive. I really do not want to bother you any more with such unpleasant reports. You hear so much of that regularly on our news media all the time. Isn't that the sad but the true state of our nation.

       You probably know someone who is deeply heartbroken from a divorce experience. While some are filled with guilt, regretfully blaming themselves for what they consider to be their foolish actions, many are pointing their accusing fingers at their exes or some other third parties for their fate. As I was saying, divorce usually come with a lot of emotions, which are mostly negative. Many if not all who experience it are feeling duped, cheated and violated. Some are feeling wounded, used and embarrassed. Yet some are feeling lonely, unloved, unappreciated, trampled upon and relegated to the lowest state of “self-esteem”, being robbed of their self-worth, self-confidence, positive self-image, dignity, self-respect and self-assurance. These experiences do undermine their fullness of joy and may now be filled with so much lack of forgiveness, anger and hatred toward their exes; their past love. Such ill feeling toward another person is a canker-worm. A super destroyer that begin to eat a person’s health fabric slowly but surely, gradually undermining the immune system which is our God’s given defense against all sicknesses and diseases. Many women and men have developed diseases such as cancer, cardiovascular problem and most especially breast cancer among the women because of these negative emotions that resulted from bad marriages.

       My dear friend, you don’t have to experience such a devastation. And if you are already in such a situation there is help. There is solution. This is why God who love you so much made it possible for this book to be written. And that same God who knows what you are going through right now and desire love, joy and peace for you is the one who put this book in your hand and provided you with this opportunity to read and be blessed. Amen.

      Yes I know you are asking, how does that poem about the painting “Together Forever” read? It is actually very simple. Here it is:"

Energize & renew your Marriage Commitment with this POEM hanging on your walls; at home in the living room, family room, dinning room, bedroom and in the office.

POEM

More Irresistible Perks: (& great gifts for ALL)

E-mail your digital photo to thelastmessage911@gmail.com or send your hard copy photograph to PO Box 10342, San Bernardino, CA 92423-0342.

Without Frame: 8.5"x11" parchment paper size, autographed and emboss sealed by the author/artist.

IT DOESN'T HAVE TO BE A WEDDING PICTURE. IT COULD BE ANY PICTURE OF YOU BOTH OR THE FAMILY PICTURE THAT YOU LIKE TO DISPLAY.

ALL THE DESCRIPTIONS AND SPECIFICATIONS THAT APPLY  TO THE "Together Forever" POEM ABOVE ALSO APPLY TO THE "United Family"

EXCEPT THAT THE UNITED FAMILY POEM MAY HAVE SPACE FOR TWO PHOTOGRAPHS.

story:
Rural Poets headed to the National Slam

Hailing from the hardscrabble lands of Lanark County, Ontario, our team of five slam poets are headed down the road to Montreal this November to represent at Canada's National Slam competition, held each year as part of the Canadian Festival of the Spoken Word. As the only rural team, we bring the voice of back roads and small towns, of strong bonds and deep roots, of hard rock, shallow soils and slim margins, to a competition that is overwhelmingly urban. We stand out, to be sure. 

The land and community that nurtures that strong voice is also our handicap. The Canadian Shield is beautiful country but, as the saying goes, "There ain't a square meal in a square mile!" Folks are spread pretty thin on the ground and a living can be as marginal as the farmland. This locale makes fundraising a challenge, especially when there are so many needs more basic than poetry. Supporting a team of poets in Montreal for a week is a hard 'ask' anywhere, but with fewer pockets and shallow means, sustaining a slam scene is tough.

But, the truth is, Lanark County needs to be in Montreal! The Canadian slam scene needs to hear rural voices! It needs to be shaken out of its complacent, uber-urban narrow-mindedness and reminded that diversity is open-ended. And that there is a rich, deep and ancient arts scene out beyond the four-lane.  If we can get on that stage, we will be heard. 

So..what do we need, and what do you get?

Money for food, accommodation and travel. Pretty basic stuff, really.  

CSFW Montreal have arranged very economical accommodation  The hotel suites have fully equipped kitchens which we will use to reduce the cost of food. We can drive to Montreal. Parking will add some additional costs. All the venues are nearby, but CFSW still recommends getting a transit pass for the week. 

Nevertheless, our budget for the trip is $2500. We run a monthly slam season throughout the year and do fundraisers at farmer's markets, etc. but bake-sales, and gate receipts have only taken us so far. Last year's trip to CFSW in Saskatoon was an artistic success but a financial burden that carried over into this year. We are still short at least $1500 and that amount is a deal-breaker for us.

Paddling For Poets! 

I am offering canoeing and river rescue instruction in exchange for donations to Lanark Live Poets Society [LiPS]. I have taught canoeing for over 24 years and guided canoe trips in Ontario and Quebec for over 40 years. I have worked as a rafting guide on the Ottawa River in Ontario and on the Rio Antigua in Veracruz, Mexico. My teaching style is based on positive encouragement and enjoying the lesson. I am happy to work with children 8 yrs old and up.  No certification will be provided. ALL monies will go to Lanark LiPS trip to CFSW 2013 in Montreal. All activities are taken at your own risk.

What you get depends on what you want and the size of your donation.

FOR CANOE TRIPPING INSTRUCTION  PERK, please contact me before claiming these to ensure that timing and details can be worked out. I will do my best to accommodate your schedule but I cannot guarantee availability.

Other Ways You Can Help

Transport to Montreal and parking while we are there is a problem. [You would think that poets would travel light!] Any help out with either of these issues would be great. Perth to Montreal and back a week later - Nov 4th to 10th.
